description: Denominators of continued fraction convergents to sqrt(87).
links: Vincenzo Librandi, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..200
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,56,0,-1).
formula: G.f.: (1 +3*x -x^2)/(x^4 -56*x^2 +1), - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013a(n) = 56*a(n-2) - a(n-4). - _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013
mathematica: Denominator/@Convergents[Sqrt[87], 50] (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Jul 05 2011 *)CoefficientList[Series[(1 + 3 x - x^2)/(x^4 - 56 x^2 + 1), {x, 0, 30}], x] (* _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013 *)
prog: (MAGMA) I:=[1, 3, 55, 168]; [n le 4 select I[n] else 56*Self(n-2)-Self(n-4): n in [1..40]]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Dec 12 2013
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
